Fix certificate logo display and improve PDF generation

- Fixed one-time fee plan validation in database schema
- Updated students/active PDF to match students/admission format
- Fixed logo display in students/certificates page

1. lib/ourscheema.sql: Added ''one-time'' to fee_plan check constraint
2. app/\(dashboard\)/students/active/page.js:

   - Replaced addTwoColumnFields with professional multi-column layout
   - Added responsive columns \(3 for landscape, 2 for portrait\)
   - Added styled field cards with backgrounds and borders
   - Updated section spacing to be orientation-aware

3. app/\(dashboard\)/students/certificates/page.js:
   - Fixed certificate generation to fetch school data directly
   - Simplified logo loading \(removed complex canvas clipping\)
   - Fixed Supabase query order \(.select before .eq\)
   - Changed to fixed logo size \(20mm\) matching students/reports
   - Updated both character and leaving certificate generators

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
